I thought it was very weird so then I kept scrolling through the app so I could get more ğŸŠeducatedğŸŠ and my vision started going blurry so I got up and took a sip of my water. So with the little bit of consciousness I had left, I PULLED myself to the phone and before I could do anything the screen was turning orange and our âœ¨presidentsâœ¨ nudes were displayed on the screen. I was appalled. I quickly deleted the app and things went back to normal but I think Iâ€™m going to need EXTENSIVE therapy, but itâ€™s good I found a therapist the charges $75 a session and expect that Trump will reimburse me for the pain I went through by paying for my therapy and the renovation of my home that I just couldnâ€™t focus on anymore due to my traumatizing experience that almost made me blindâœ¨ğŸ˜– donâ€™t recommend this app unless you want similar experiencesğŸ˜­ğŸ˜–ğŸ˜Œ
